sub_title: Userguest (We are Hiring) - Founder of the world's most exciting Hotel Website Revenue Booster 🚀
summary:
Founder of Userguest - The Hotel Website Revenue Booster 🚀 We empower hoteliers to take back control of their direct bookings through an innovative concept called RevMarketingAutomation! 

Previously, Managing Director & Co-Founder of Swell Hotel Marketing – A leading digital agency specialising in the Hospitality industry, helping luxury hotels and resorts achieve their revenue goals. Through effective paid media campaigns management, data insights, industry in-depth knowledge and hotel performance consultation. Connecting hotels with new digital technologies.

A senior hotel marketing professional with extensive experience in performance marketing. Having led large-scale performance marketing projects for the online travel industry leaders. From bidding algorithm creation, and processes automation to 50+ Million$ in media spend management. Highly technical marketeer with great leadership and strategic skills. 

Specialities: Hotel marketing, digital marketing, hotel consultation, performance marketing, search engine marketing, display, remarketing, Facebook ads, bidding automation, and bidding algorithms.

treasury_media.title: Online Performance for Hotels: The Hotel's guide to generating more direct bookings
treasury_media.description: IF YOU WANT TO INCREASE YOUR HOTEL’S ONLINE BOOKINGS – THIS IS THE BOOK FOR YOU! Not enough direct bookings? Learn how your hotel can generate significantly more reservations.

school.name: UQAM | Université du Québec à Montréal

publications.name: Online marketing for Hotels: The hotel's guide to generating more direct bookings

authors.headline: Userguest (We are Hiring) - Founder of the world's most exciting Hotel Website Revenue Booster 🚀
Userguest. Tech & Marketing for Hotels. Founder. We are Hiring !

profile_positions.description: Userguest is a smart notifications tool that helps hotels increase their revenue online by converting more users into guests. It uses artificial intelligence to display customized notifications to each user to convince them to complete the booking process.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Managing Director 
•	Head of operations 
•	Account management and client servicing
•	Lead on automation processes 
•	Head of campaign management teams
profile_positions.title: Managing Director, Co-founder

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for customer acquisition through META partner websites. In charge of the day-to-day maintenance of European (FIGS) pay-per-click/Display campaigns on strategic travel partner website (Tripadvisor – world’s largest travel website)
Provide analytical support to the Partner Marketing team in campaigns management to ensure the company meets the traffic acquisition and shopper conversion goals. 
Ingest reports from tracking providers, (e.g. Omniture, Google Analytics) and internal dashboards and databases (Tableau and Business Objects, Hive - SQL) to draw insights on the regional and global marketing behaviours, looking at channels, customers, hotels, destinations and site landing pages. 
Create bidding algorithms (Advanced Excel user) to help drive successful campaigns, generating revenue and profit on partner digital advertisement platform  – resulted in increased conversion rates.
Collaborated with the Meta Search Solutions team to build bidding technology platform that fully automated bidding efforts - Work closely with Data scientist and operation solutions teams to set up A/B testing methodology – testing new algorithms, new data ingestion processes and reports to test performance in a structured way.
profile_positions.title: Partner marketing manager

profile_positions.description:
Owned, developed and managed all aspects of the paid search campaigns for key clients including strategy, planning and managing activities across multiple search engines on an ongoing basis. 
Produced reports,studies and presentations to clients on a monthly basis.
Made data-driven recommendations for landing page and site copy that increased conversions and decreased spend
Maximized synergies between paid and natural search campaigns – Worked closely with SEO counter parts.
Continuously  researched and analysed new market trends and search opportunities to expand campaigns. Published executive summaries of search reports, test results, and strategic insights. Analysed data to further optimise and develop campaigns. A/B Tests - analysed results from tests and recommended campaign changes and updates. 
Participated on sales pitches to acquire new clients and to cross-sell additional advertisement services to existing clients ( RTB and paid search).
profile_positions.title: Paid Media Analyst

profile_positions.description:
SEM skills and daily tasks : 
Account management:
Involved in planning and managing multiple high profile search accounts primarily focusing on PPC. Managing strategy implementat across various global markets on behalf of central clients (LBS,Land Rover,BP, Volvo, Castrol, Castrol Edge and Zurich).
Execution
Managed and executed multiple campaigns all achieving great results and exceeding client’s expectations.Handling account structure and creation, trafficking, tracking, translations (French and Spanish) and day-to-day optimisation.(LBS, BP and Castrol)
Media Planning:
Worked on different budgets estimations, for clients pitching purposes, in various areas (Display, Search and placements)  at international level. Assisted on many projects, setting up budgets required to meet client’s needs.
Search Audits:
Worked on different search audits, assessing search marketing campaigns based on Search Engine Marketing best practices. Presenting findings and recommendations to clients (ADT, Zurich, BP, Unilever and Kraft).
Coordination:
Liaise, built and maintain strong relationship with markets, clients, media owners and vendors. Supervise search strategy implementation, tracking resources and budget spend globally from the central office (Land Rover/BP/Volvo).
Monitoring:
Monitor local markets search campaigns, recommend best practices to improve performance. Recommend next steps to ensure global strategy is implemented and search activity is as efficient as possible.
Data analysis:
Produce monthly and weekly reports for multiple clients (BP, LBS, Castrol, Zurich Insurance). Highlighting key metrics, drawing useful insights, learnings and recommendations for the client account.
Google Adwords Qualified user.
profile_positions.title: Search Executive Worldwide - Central Team
